ygData.subject: Re: Bank and Farie Dragons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... OK, I could certainly be wrong about the no cash .  I avoided hunting them, but one of our guildmembers who has taken up jewelry making recently started
ygData.messageBody:
>Hmmmm....I hunt Faerie Dragons (known as Fae Drakes) in the Lesser
>Faydark...sometimes they hunt ME! However, the reason I hunt them is
>for the cash - most I get have one or two gold on them...

OK, I could certainly be wrong about the "no cash". I avoided hunting
them, but one of our guildmembers who has taken up jewelry making recently
started killing them to get gems. That's where I heard about them carrying
gems and jewelry.

- Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
